mapper.sql: VM_ID, VM_CODE, VM_MODEL, PURCHASE_DATE, STATUS, VM_POSITION, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, VM_TYPE
mapper.select:
select from where 1=1
and VM_ID=#{vmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and VM_CODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{vmCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
and VM_MODEL like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{vmModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
and PURCHASE_DATE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{purchaseDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
and STATUS like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
and VM_POSITION like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{vmPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
and LONGITUDE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
and LATITUDE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
and VM_TYPE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{vmType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
order by ${sort} ${order}
mapper.insert:
insert into APP_VIDEO_MONITOR_DEVICE
VM_ID,
VM_CODE,
VM_MODEL,
PURCHASE_DATE,
STATUS,
VM_POSITION,
LONGITUDE,
LATITUDE,
VM_TYPE,
#{vmId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{vmCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vmModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{purchaseDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vmPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vmType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update APP_VIDEO_MONITOR_DEVICE
VM_CODE = #{vmCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VM_MODEL = #{vmModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PURCHASE_DATE = #{purchaseDate,jdbcType=DATE},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VM_POSITION = #{vmPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LONGITUDE = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LATITUDE = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VM_TYPE = #{vmType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where VM_ID = #{vmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update APP_VIDEO_MONITOR_DEVICE set VM_CODE = #{vmCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VM_MODEL = #{vmModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PURCHASE_DATE = #{purchaseDate,jdbcType=DATE}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VM_POSITION = #{vmPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LONGITUDE = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LATITUDE = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VM_TYPE = #{vmType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where VM_ID = #{vmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
